Frank Roat

  1. Foster Name: Frank
  2. Foster Family: Scott and Faye Arnold
  3. Location of Family: Armada, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Unknown
  6. Age on Arrival: 8
  7. Date of Birth: 1920-01-01, PA
  8. Date of Death: 1985-10-17
  9. Gender: male
  10. Spouse Name: Lula E. Arnold
  11. Notes: The 1930 census gives birthplace as NY; 1940 census gives it as PA. In 1940, Frank is listed as the Arnolds' foster son. After their marriage, Frank and Lula lived in Kearney, NE.
  12. Source: 1930 United States Federal Census; 1940 United States Federal Census; Kearney Daily Hub (NE), 12 March 1956, 2:3; Gravestone, Armada Cemetery, Miller, NE
